column4: hi, i cannot enter in my webserver apache: it told me "You don't have permission to access / on this server."
hi, i cannot enter in my webserver apache: it told me "You don't have permission to access / on this server."
does the www account have read perissios on the folder?
how could see if www account have or not this permission?
or whatever dir you got the webbserver pointed at
is it the public thats gets the error?
sorry i can't check against my server cus it's down atm.
maybe.. i don't understand where is the problem... in the dir Public or in /var/www
you'll have to check the errorlog
where i could find the log??
found!! this is the log!  http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/75431/
do you have the options FollowSymLinks in your apache config under the default site?
and what permissions do you have on the dir /home/luigi/wwwebserver
and this is my conf:  http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/75436/
i think you need to set permissions so that www account can read the dir
how could i set this permission?
i've done chmod -R a+r /home/luigi/wwwserver, but this did'nt work yet!
this is my IP: 217.133.74.142 if you want to try to open it....
i think i'v located the prob
could i delete my conf and paste your pastebin?
it's only the <Document that i have changed
then restart the server sudo /etc/init.d/apache restart
just copy the line 11 or all the file?
maybe the restarting didn't work: http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/75451/
yes it worked that's only a warning
impossible to touch /home/luigi/wwwebserver/index.html: any file o dir.
i'll post a conf for you in about 3min

check that the paths are right

or i had to check each line?
something is wrong with the config
ok... just << on ehte first line.. changed!!!
ok... but the problem isn't solved: FOBIDDEN you don't have permission....

just pm me the 3 last lines

ops.. it works! my english it's so shameful!!!! worse tha my knowledge on linux!
